author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body: Hi, just wondering what might be holding this up :) Is there a waiting period longer than 6 days for new packages now?

No, sorry. Can you please add
```
[compat]
julia = "1"
```
to your project file and retrigger the bot and then we can merge
